hook.text: Ebola kills up to 90% of those infected. Patients bleed from eyes and organs as the virus destroys blood vessels.

punchline.text: The deadliest viruses aren't always the ones that spread farthest.

quiz.question: Why doesn't Ebola cause global pandemics despite its high fatality rate?
options: It spreads only through direct bodily fluid contact, not through the air
It only infects people in tropical climates
Vaccines have been available since its discovery
